ctx: intros d pl0 pl1 Hcomp Hrec.
exceptions.tactic: destruct (union_pl_r_0 d pl0 pl1 tnil Hrec) as [Hrec0 | Hrec1].

original: intros d pl0 pl1 Hcomp Hrec. destruct Hcomp as [[Hpl0 Hpl1] | [Hnpl0 Hnpl1]]. - left. rewrite sem_listes_2 in Hrec. rewrite Hrec. apply rec_empty. - destruct (union_pl_r_0 d pl0 pl1 tnil Hrec) as [Hrec0 | Hrec1]. + left. auto. + right. auto.
